mutants.code:
def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('')
    reversed_words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::+1]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::-2]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::-0]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::-0]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(S: str) -> str:
    words = S.split('.')
    reversed_words = words[::--1]
    reversed_string = '.'.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string
